content: आप्लु {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To jump up, dance, spring; आप्लुत्य पदान्यष्टौ <ls>Mb.</ls>; (रथं) आपुप्लुवे सिंह इवाचलाग्रं. {@--2@} To bathe, wash, immerse oneself (<ab>fig.</ab> also); प्रयागे आप्लुत्य गात्राणि <ls>Mb.</ls>; आप्लुत्याकाशगंगायां {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; <ls>Ms. 7. 216</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 203.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (प्लावयति) {@--1@} To cause to be washed or bathed; आप्लावयत गात्राणि <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To wash, wet, sprinkle; अन्नमाप्लाव्य वारिणा <ls>Ms. 3. 244</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 98.</ls> {@--3@} To overflow, overwhelm, inundate, flood over. {@--4@} To set in commotion. {@--5@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) To bathe.
